segments.text: I can't believe how calm the mom is, standing in that puddle of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just drying that plate like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the kids behind her, being so sneaky and reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really pushing his luck, climbing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is just as guilty, encouraging him to do it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't break anything or make a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the mom is going to notice before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is making me feel a bit stressed, to be honest.
segments.speaker: PAR
